name: @atomist/antlr
description: Atomist client integration with ANTLR for TypeScript
author: Atomist, Inc.

scripts.antlr4ts:js:parser: antlr4ts -visitor src/tree/ast/antlr/javascript/JavaScriptParser.g4 && mv src/tree/ast/antlr/javascript/*.ts src/tree/ast/antlr/javascript/antlr-gen && mv src/tree/ast/antlr/javascript/*.tokens src/tree/ast/antlr/javascript/antlr-gen
scripts.antlr4ts:js: npm run antlr4ts:js:lexer && npm run antlr4ts:js:parser
scripts.antlr4ts:kotlin:parser: antlr4ts -lib src/tree/ast/antlr/kotlin -visitor src/tree/ast/antlr/kotlin/KotlinParser.g4 && mv src/tree/ast/antlr/kotlin/*.ts src/tree/ast/antlr/kotlin/antlr-gen && mv src/tree/ast/antlr/kotlin/*.tokens src/tree/ast/antlr/kotlin/antlr-gen
scripts.antlr4ts:kotlin: npm run antlr4ts:kotlin:lexer && npm run antlr4ts:kotlin:parser
scripts.autotest: supervisor -q -n exit -e ts -x npm -- run test
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm test
scripts.clean: npm run clean-js ; rm -rf *-v8.log profile.txt build
scripts.clean-js: find src test -type f -name '*.js' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -f
